title: Indera Men's Traditional Waffle Thermal Underwear Long Sleeve Shirt
description: Indera's thermal underwear and winterweight rib underwear products are available in various colors and styles made for men, women, boys, and girls. Our diverse product line is designed to keep customers comfortable in virtually any climate and all weather conditions. Indera’s traditional long johns for men offer a familiar deep-rooted warmth. The waffle-knit fabric traps and retains body heat within the waffle pockets. The cotton-rich blend enhances comfort, while the polyester adds stability and utility to the garment. Our men’s thermal shirt is best used as a base or first layer in cold to very cold weather. Ideal workwear, our men’s thermal underwear is also great for activities like hiking, camping, lounging, or any other application where multiple layers are needed.
